result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

chargeModifiers.descr: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Brittany L Krueger

defendant.name: Krueger, Brittany L
defendant.address: 403 Jackson, Columbia County Jail, Portage, WI 53901

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Restitution stipulation in the probation amount of $44.67 plus surcharge for a total of $49.13.

Defendant Brittany L Krueger in court with attorney Peter Michael Masana.  Christine Marie Genda appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Cases called: 14CF198, 16CF162, 16CM45, 16CM47, and 16CM287.  In 14CF198 defense stipulated on Ct. 1 in regards with order to show cause.   In 16CF162 Rights/Elements.  Defendant pled no contest to Cts. 2,5, & 8 of amended complaint.  Court found guilty.  Judgment was entered.  Cts. 1,3,4,6, & 7 Dismissed but read in.  Court sentenced defendant to 2 years prison, imposed and stayed.  1 year initial confinement and 1 year extended supervision, all counts concurrent to each other.  Court placed defendant on probation for 2 years.  Conditions of probation include: AODA and comply.  Maintain absolute sobriety.  Not to possess/consume any controlled substances without a valid Rx. or any drug paraphernalia.  Random UA tests by agent.  Restitution payment in full.  Maintain full time work, school, treatment or combination of all.  Ct. 2 $443.00 costs.  Ct. 5 $243.00 costs.  Ct. 8 $243.00 costs.  16CM45, 16CM47, and 16CM287 Dismissed but read in for restitution purposes.  Submit DNA sample.  In 14CF198 Court adjudicated defendant on Ct. 1 guilty  Judgment was entered.  Court sentenced defendant on Ct. 1 to serve 6 months jail.  $318.00 costs.  60 days to pay or set up a payment plan with Clerk of Courts.  6 months Ct. 2.  90 days Ct. 3 all concurrent.  This is a time served sentence.  Civil judgment for Counts 2 & 3 and any unpaid financial obligations.  147 days credit.
